comment: Important PSA to frequent visitors of Free Speech Group: Because of the lefts new onslaught of attacks against & , Gab will likely be down come Monday morning & remain that way for a few weeks while Gab tries to find a new host. Love you & hope to see you all posting again soon!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / publication

                  :op1 "PSA")

                  :ARG0-of (v / visit-01

                                    :op1 "Free"
                                    :op2 "Speech"
                                    :op3 "Group"))
                        :ARG1-of (f / frequent-02))))
      :snt2 (l / likely-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (d / down-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab"))
                        :time (d2 / date-entity
                              :weekday (m2 / monday)
                              :dayperiod (m3 / morning)))
                  :op2 (r / remain-01
                        :ARG1 p3
                        :ARG3 (w / way
                              :mod (t / that))
                        :duration (f2 / few
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (w2 / week)))
                        :time (t3 / try-01
                              :ARG0 p3
                              :ARG1 (f3 / find-01
                                    :ARG0 p3
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h / host-01)
                                          :ARG1-of (n4 / new-01))))))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (o / onslaught
                        :mod (a2 / attack-01
                              :ARG1 p3)
                        :ARG1-of (n5 / new-01)
                        :poss (l2 / left-19))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (l3 / love-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (y / you
                        :mod (a4 / all)))
            :op2 (h2 / hope-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (s / see-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (p5 / post-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :mod (a5 / again)
                              :time (s2 / soon))))))

comment: Is it not a broad generalization? Let's try thinking about the complexity of this. What are you really upset about & how can it be remedied?

comment: Free speech is our right. But to get answers you don't go around asking like that. Just state the problem and ask why.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / right-05
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG3-of (f / free-04)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (g / go-06
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (a / ask-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                              :ARG2 (t / that)))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / around)
                  :purpose (g2 / get-01

      :snt3 (a4 / and

                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
